ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhoneSecond###Priority
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default priority for new phone tickets in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhoneSecond###ArticleType
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default article type for new phone tickets in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhoneSecond###SenderType
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default sender type for new phone ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhoneSecond::AllowMultipleFrom
ConfigItem.Description: Controls if more than one from entry can be set in the new phone ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhoneSecond###Subject
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default subject for new phone tickets (e.g. 'Phone call') in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhoneSecond###Body
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default note text for new telephone tickets. E.g 'New ticket via call' in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhoneSecond###StateDefault
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default next state for new phone tickets in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhoneSecond###StateType
ConfigItem.Description: Determines the next possible ticket states, after the creation of a new phone ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhoneSecond###HistoryType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history type for the phone ticket screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhoneSecond###HistoryComment
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history comment for the phone ticket screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhoneSecond###SplitLinkType
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default link type of splitted tickets in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::ToolBarModule###4-Ticket::AgentTicketPhoneSecond
ConfigItem.Description: Toolbar Item for a shortcut.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketPhoneSecond
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhoneSecond###DynamicField
ConfigItem.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the ticket phone screen of the agent interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled, 2 = Enabled and required.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketEmailSecond###Priority
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default priority for new email tickets in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketEmailSecond###ArticleType
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default article type for new email tickets in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketEmailSecond###SenderType
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default sender type for new email tickets in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketEmailSecond###Subject
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default subject for new email tickets (e.g. 'email Outbound') in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketEmailSecond###Body
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default text for new email tickets in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketEmailSecond###StateDefault
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default next ticket state, after the creation of an email ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketEmailSecond###StateType
ConfigItem.Description: Determines the next possible ticket states, after the creation of a new email ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketEmailSecond###HistoryType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history type for the email ticket screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketEmailSecond###HistoryComment
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history comment for the email ticket screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::ToolBarModule###5-Ticket::AgentTicketEmailSecond
ConfigItem.Description: Toolbar Item for a shortcut.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketEmailSecond
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

NavBar.Description: Create new email ticket and send this out (outbound)
NavBar.Name: New email ticket 2

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketEmailSecond###DynamicField
ConfigItem.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the ticket email screen of the agent interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled, 2 = Enabled and required.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterElementPost###AgentTicketCreateSecond
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the filter to fix redirects.
